title: Recommender - Access control in Transparency and Control Center
abstract:
# Recommender - Access control in Transparency and Control Center
# Access control in Transparency and Control Center
content:
## Overview
The Transparency and Control Center uses [Identity and Access Management (IAM)](/iam) for access control.
In Transparency and Control Center, access control can be configured at the organization or project level.
For a detailed description of IAM and its features, refer to the [IAM documentation](/iam/docs) . In particular, refer to the section on [managing IAMpolicies](/iam/docs/granting-changing-revoking-access) .
Viewing or updating settings in the Transparency and Control Center requires the caller to have the necessary permissions. See [Roles](#roles) for more information.
## Roles
The following table lists the Transparency and Control Center IAM roles, including the permissions associated with each role.
| Role                      | Permissions        |
|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-------------------------------------------|
| Data Processing Controls Resource Admin (roles/dataprocessing.admin)      | dataprocessing.*       |
| Data Processing IAM Access History Exporter (roles/dataprocessing.iamAccessHistoryExporter) | dataprocessing.iamaccesshistory.exportData |
